SELECT count(id) total, count( CASE WHEN dmr.state = 'merged' THEN 'merged' END ) merged, count( CASE WHEN dmr.state = 'closed' THEN 'closed' END ) closed, count( CASE WHEN dmr.state = 'opened' THEN 'opened' END ) opened FROM devops_merge_request dmr where dmr.gitlab_project_id = #{projectId}
